short_summary: Purchase of office seating for Port aux Basques
description: This solicitation is for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to Port aux Basques by May 22, 2024. The solicitation is for a single supplier to provide a quote.  Initially, this solicitation was made in September 2021 with a closing date of October 2, 2021. Further details are included in the attached documents.
full_summary:
**Office Seating Tender Announcement**

**Tender Reference Number**: WS4394865837

**Identifier:** MA021-230189 Office Seating Port aux Basques

**Description**

Marine Atlantic Inc. is seeking a contractor to provide office seating at Port aux Basques.  The tender requires the purchase, delivery and installation of high-quality office seating within a specified timeframe. The deadline for submission of applications is **February 2, 2024, 2:00 pm EST**.

**Background and Requirements**

The contract will be awarded through a competitive bidding process.  Marine Atlantic Inc. has registered with the PWGSC through the Supply Arrangement # E60PQ-120001/H.

**Scope of Work**

The supply of Rotary chairs, Sure-Lite task chairs, 514 chairs, and Packs of seat and back cushions to match our existing office furniture.

**Deliverables**

* Ensure all products meet safety standards
* The furniture should reflect consistent style
* Marine Atlantic office locations at Port aux Basques

**Other**

* Sales tax (HST(GST+PS) is applicable to this tender
* no warranty or liability claims exist
* ensure the delivery by authorized representatives.
* two keys are included with the purchased unit for manual adjustment and set on fixed mode (NO GRID

**Point of Contact**

To obtain additional information regarding this tender, contact Melanie Gillis, Classification and Handling Purchasing Officer at Melissa.gillis2@ime@gso.

Please refer to the following link to access the formal tender document: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18519326?extsite=MTg1MTkzMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==



**Due Date**: 2024-02-02 14:00:00
